customize.title: Customize {{productName}}
customize.description: Customize to your preferred settings. You can always change them later from the {{productName}} Hub or settings page.

appearance.title: 外观设置
appearance.description: You can customize {{productName}}'s appearance to your preference. Choose a light or dark theme, or have it automatically switch based on your system settings.

finish.title: 设置已完成！
finish.subtitle: Congratulations! You've completed the {{productName}} setup. Enjoy a comfortable and secure internet browsing experience.
finish.hint: For more detailed settings, you can customize via the Settings option in the menu button at the top right.

welcomePage.description: {{productName}} is a fast and user-friendly web browser that emphasizes privacy and security. This guide will introduce you to the main features and settings of {{productName}}.
welcomePage.readyToStart: When you're ready, click the below button to proceed.

localizationPage.title: {{productName}} speaks your language
localizationPage.subtitle: Check language settings and change if needed
localizationPage.chooseLanguage: Choose from a wide range of languages
localizationPage.languageChangeNotice: Changing language will apply the new language without restarting {{productName}}. Some add-ons may not support language changes.

featuresPage.title: Main {{productName}} Features
featuresPage.subtitle: {{productName}} comes with many useful features. Check out the feature overview!

panelSidebar.title: Panel Sidebar
panelSidebar.description: Access convenient features from the sidebar on the right while browsing. You can place web panels, note-taking functions, add-ons, bookmarks, etc. in the sidebar.
features: Quickly take notes with {{productName}} Notes while browsing

workspaces.title: 工作区
workspaces.description: Organize multiple tab sets to streamline your work. Quickly switch between workspaces with distinctive icons and names. Access via the workspace button in the top left.
features: Categorize by purpose: work, personal, etc.

pwa.title: Progressive Web Applications Support
pwa.description: On Windows, you can add PWA-compatible sites as desktop applications when you visit them. Regular websites can also be installed.

mouseGesture.title: 鼠标手势
mouseGesture.description: Control your browser more intuitively with natively implemented mouse gesture functionality. Execute gestures by holding the right-click button and moving your mouse.
features: 快速浏览页面和历史记录

finishPage.title: 设置已完成！
finishPage.subtitle: Congratulations! You've completed the {{productName}} setup. You can now enjoy comfortable and secure internet browsing.
finishPage.hint: For more detailed settings, you can customize via the Settings option in the menu button at the top right.
finishPage.defaultBrowserSuccess: {{productName}} 已被设置为您的默认浏览器！
